IRON FOUNDRY

Drop Iron Foundry components into a running Cloud Foundry environment and immediately start deploying and managing .NET applications.
DOWNLOAD IRON FOUNDRY

Github Project

  • Follow @ironfoundryorg
  • Tweet

PUSH, SCALE OUT, SCALE DOWN

DO ALL THE THINGS WITH .NET APPS THAT YOU CAN WITH ANY OTHER APPLICATION RUNNING IN A CLOUD FOUNDRY ENVIRONMENT

WHY IRON FOUNDRY?

It's Open Source

Fork it, improve it, or simply monitor our development out in the open. View our Github repos.

Run It Wherever

Want a public cloud? Use a provider running Iron Foundry. Prefer to operate a private PaaS? Install and operate Iron Foundry yourself!

Flexibility For A Polyglot World

Today's apps are highly optimized mash-ups of different platforms and frameworks. Need a .NET web applications that uses Node.js for a mobile interface and stores data in both relational and NoSQL databases? Do that today with Cloud Foundry + Iron Foundry.

Community

We work closely with Pivotal (creators of Cloud Foundry) and our users to regularly improve the project.

featured in

Provided by Tier 3

Iron Foundry is a project initiated by Tier 3, an enterprise cloud computing and hosting platform.
